description: Comprehensive task breakdown for building the Webflow Project Calculator with AI-powered cost estimation and website crawling

tasks.title: Initialize project repository and development environment

subtasks.title: Set up GitHub repository with proper .gitignore
subtasks.details: Include node_modules, .env, build artifacts

subtasks.title: Initialize Next.js 16 project with TypeScript
subtasks.details: Use create-next-app@latest with TypeScript template and App Router

subtasks.title: Configure Tailwind CSS for styling
subtasks.details: Set up tailwind.config.js with custom colors and components

subtasks.title: Set up project structure and folder organization
subtasks.details: Create /components, /pages, /lib, /hooks, /types, /utils folders

subtasks.title: Configure TypeScript with strict mode
subtasks.details: Set up tsconfig.json with strict typing

subtasks.title: Set up version control workflow (GitFlow or trunk-based)
subtasks.details: Document branching strategy and PR process

subtasks.title: Configure Prettier and ESLint for code formatting
subtasks.details: Set up consistent code style across team

tasks.title: Set up third-party service accounts and API keys

subtasks.title: Create Firecrawl account and get API key
subtasks.details: Sign up at firecrawl.dev, test free tier limits

subtasks.title: Create OpenRouter account and get API key
subtasks.details: Sign up at openrouter.ai, add initial credits

subtasks.title: Provision PostgreSQL database via Docker
subtasks.details: Create docker-compose service, configure schemas, expose ports securely

subtasks.title: Set up Redis instance (Upstash or similar)
subtasks.details: Create cache for crawl results and rate limiting

subtasks.title: Configure Stripe account for future billing
subtasks.details: Set up Stripe in test mode, create products/prices

subtasks.title: Create environment variables management
subtasks.details: Setup .env.local, document all required keys

tasks.title: Design and implement database schema

subtasks.title: Design users table schema
subtasks.details: id, email, user_type (freelancer/agency/company), created_at

subtasks.title: Design projects table schema
subtasks.details: id, user_id, title, status, created_at, updated_at

subtasks.title: Design project_responses table schema
subtasks.details: id, project_id, question_key, answer, answer_type

subtasks.title: Design crawl_results table schema
subtasks.details: id, url, url_hash, result_data, analyzed_at, expires_at

subtasks.title: Design cost_calculations table schema
subtasks.details: id, project_id, total_cost, breakdown, ai_enhanced, created_at

subtasks.title: Create indexing strategy
subtasks.details: Indexes on user_id, url_hash, created_at for performance

subtasks.title: Implement database migrations or schema updates
subtasks.details: Use Prisma/Drizzle migrations or manual SQL files

subtasks.title: Seed database with initial data (questionnaire templates, benchmarks)
subtasks.details: Load base project costs and complexity multipliers

tasks.title: Build backend API foundation with Next.js API routes or separate Node.js server

subtasks.title: Set up Next.js API routes structure
subtasks.details: Create /pages/api structure for REST endpoints

subtasks.title: Implement PostgreSQL client integration
subtasks.details: Create reusable database client wrapper (Prisma/Drizzle)

subtasks.title: Implement Redis client integration for caching
subtasks.details: Create cache wrapper with TTL management

subtasks.title: Rate limiting middleware
subtasks.details: Implement per-user rate limit (public API calls)

subtasks.title: Error handling middleware
subtasks.details: Centralized error handling with proper HTTP status codes

subtasks.title: Request validation middleware
subtasks.details: Validate incoming requests for required fields and types

subtasks.title: Set up API documentation (Swagger/OpenAPI)
subtasks.details: Document all endpoints for team reference

tasks.title: Implement authentication system (Clerk)

subtasks.details: Add Clerk components/pages and server-side callbacks

subtasks.title: Create authentication context/hooks for frontend
subtasks.details: Expose Clerk session/user data via hooks and context

subtasks.title: Implement protected routes

subtasks.title: Implement password reset flow
subtasks.details: Leverage Clerk-managed password reset + email templates

subtasks.details: Explain technical terms like 'CMS', 'Interactions'

subtasks.title: Implement save progress functionality
subtasks.details: Auto-save to localStorage every 30 seconds

subtasks.title: Add skip option for advanced questions
subtasks.details: Allow users to skip optional advanced questions

subtasks.details: Mobile-optimized input fields and layout

tasks.title: Build URL input form for existing website analysis

subtasks.title: Design URL input form with validation
subtasks.details: Input field with URL format validation

subtasks.title: Implement URL validation (regex check)
subtasks.details: Ensure valid URL format, show error messages

subtasks.title: Add loading state while crawl is in progress
subtasks.details: Spinner, progress bar, or skeleton loader

subtasks.title: Display crawl results summary
subtasks.details: Show page count, technologies detected

tasks.title: Implement basic cost calculation engine (deterministic, no AI)

subtasks.title: Define base cost estimates for each project type
subtasks.details: Landings pages: Simple ($500), Moderate ($1200), Complex ($2500)

subtasks.title: Implement complexity multiplier system
subtasks.details: Design: 1.0-2.5x, Features: 1.0-3.0x, Content: 1.0-2.0x, Tech: 1.0-2.0x

subtasks.title: Create mapping of questions to cost factors
subtasks.details: Each question answer maps to a multiplier or fixed cost

subtasks.title: Implement timeline urgency multiplier
subtasks.details: 1.0x standard, up to 1.5x for rush jobs

subtasks.title: Implement maintenance cost addition (10-30% of total)
subtasks.details: Monthly maintenance pricing

subtasks.title: Build cost calculation API endpoint
subtasks.details: POST /api/calculations: receive answers, return cost breakdown

subtasks.title: Add validation for calculation inputs
subtasks.details: Ensure required answers are provided

subtasks.title: Write unit tests for calculation engine
subtasks.details: Test edge cases, boundary values

tasks.title: Integrate Firecrawl for basic website crawling

subtasks.title: Install and configure Firecrawl SDK
subtasks.details: npm install @mendable/firecrawl-js

subtasks.title: Implement basic crawl endpoint
subtasks.details: POST /api/crawl: receive URL, trigger Firecrawl job

subtasks.title: Poll Firecrawl job status until complete
subtasks.details: Check status every 2-3 seconds, return results when ready

subtasks.title: Extract basic metrics from crawl result
subtasks.details: Page count, word count, image count

subtasks.title: Cache crawl results in Redis (30-day TTL)
subtasks.details: Hash URL and store result, check cache before crawling

subtasks.title: Add rate limiting for crawl requests
subtasks.details: Per-user rate limit, max concurrent crawls

tasks.title: Implement OpenRouter integration for basic AI features

subtasks.title: Install OpenRouter SDK or configure fetch calls
subtasks.details: Set up API client with API key

subtasks.title: Implement complexity scoring AI call
subtasks.details: Send project description, get complexity score from Claude Haiku

subtasks.title: Parse AI response and integrate scores into calculation
subtasks.details: Use AI confidence scores as additional multipliers

subtasks.title: Implement error handling for AI API failures
subtasks.details: Fallback to deterministic calculation if AI fails

subtasks.title: Add loading state for AI processing
subtasks.details: Show processing indicator during AI calls

tasks.title: Add Agency user type with team features

subtasks.details: Session-aware hook persists team config, calculates blended internal cost + recommended client rate, and auto-injects hourly rate for agency flows
